# Authentication

## Authentication Attributes

"Describes the authentication information of an authenticated user."

| Attribute           | Type   | Description                                               | Examples                                           | Stability                                                        |
| ------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
